entry.title: A Small Modification to Segwit
entry.summary: In a Bitcoin-dev forum discussion, a user named praxeology_guy brought up the equation of Power Cost + Capital Rent + Labor being equivalent to block reward + fees. He then questioned why people refer to the subsidy as the block reward and clarified that the block reward includes both the subsidy and fees. This conversation delves into the economics behind Bitcoin mining and the terminology used within the community to describe rewards for miners.
